ComicInfo.Series: Brian Pulido's Medieval Lady Death: War of the Winds
ComicInfo.Summary:
Medieval Lady Death fights for all humanity in this epic new eight-issue series.
Lady Death is under the thrall of her Eldritch father, Tvarus. He's tapped into to vast powers she didn't know she had and he sends her to destroy the city of Giligard. Can Wolf, Cai and Archbishop Vittorio stop her before she does the unthinkable? Hundreds of lives hang in the balance. Plus who are their unlikely allies? And who defects from the Eldritch battle camp?
